templates.name: ipblock-log
templates.title: IP Block Log by Neomediatech
templates.description: Log degli IP bloccati, inseriti in un db MariaDB
templates.note:
IMPORTANT:

You must create the path where you host configurations, eg: mkdir -p /srv/data/docker/containers/ipblock-log

env.name: DOMAIN
env.label: DOMAIN
env.description: Base domain used to create FQDN addresses for let's encrypt

env.name: TRAEFIK_WHITELIST
env.label: TRAEFIK_WHITELIST
env.description: elenco di classi/ip autorizzate ad attraversare traefik, separati da virgola

env.name: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.label: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.description: Path for the stack. Must exists before launching this stack!

templates.name: rbldns
templates.title: RBLdns by Neomediatech
templates.note:
IMPORTANT:

You must create the path where you host configurations, eg: mkdir -p /srv/data/docker/containers/rbldns

env.name: RBL_DOMAIN
env.label: RBL_DOMAIN
env.description: Domain used to host the DNSBL lists

env.name: LOGGING
env.label: LOGGING
env.description: Enable DNS query logging? 1 -> Yes , 0 -> No

env.name: CUSTOM_ZONES
env.label: CUSTOM_ZONES
env.description: List of custom zones separated by comma (ex: mylist,otherlist.txt,third.list)

env.name: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.label: STACK_BASE_PATH
env.description: Path for the stack. Must exists before launching this stack!
